transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Haan Govind Namaskar.
Customer: Namaskar.
Executive: Maine call diya tha unko, theek hai unse baat hui.
Customer: Wo keh rahe hain ki aapne kuch unke sath fraud vagera kiya tha pehle 7 lakh ka.
Customer: 7 lakh ka kya fraud kiya hai?
Executive: Keh rahe hain ki unhone kisi company ke mal kisi company ke naam se mere paas paisa bhijwaya fir uske baad dusri wo company bol li maine paisa bheja mujhko mal do kuch aisa bata rahe the.
Customer: Haan haan theek hai.
Executive: To humne kaha wo aapka personal matter tha usme to hum kuch nahi kar payenge. To keh rahe hain ki ye jo buyer hai aapka matlab ye jo Neeraj ji hai na ye aapko kahan se mile the? Ye IndiaMART se mile the ya kahan se mile the aapko?
Customer: IndiaMART se mile the.
Executive: Haan?
Customer: IndiaMART se.
Executive: IndiaMART se mile lekin inki company registered nahi hai.
Customer: Are registered mister main factory dali hai ab.
Executive: Kya hua?
Customer: Hum dekho aapko bhej rahe hain unka detail.
Executive: Kya kehna hai?
Customer: Mittal main factory. Neeraj ke naam se inki registered hai bhaiya?
Executive: Haan maine aap jo aapne number bheja hai na.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Us number se humne check kiya to mujhe company registered nahi hai hamare paas. Unki company sirf aur sirf matlab aise jaise koi profile nahi normal bana ke dal deta hai.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Bas wo aise dikh rahi hai. Unhone paid service vagera kuch leke nahi rakhi hui hai.
Executive: To wo keh rahe hain ki jab Mittal Mittal machhardani factory ke naam se company yahan pe dikh rahi hai wo bhi band dikh rahi hai.
Customer: Aap kis naam se bata rahe ho?
Customer: Haan machhardani factory ye dekho maine catalog bhej diya.
Executive: Haan kya keh rahe hain?
Customer: Catalog bhej rahe hain inka aapko.
Executive: Haan wo jo aap bata jo aap bhej bhejoge na wo hi hai kyuki hamare paas yahi company banegi na ek naam se to.
Executive: To abhi mujhe batao ki kya problem hai wo keh rahe hain ki wo mere factory aa chuke hain do teen baar.
Customer: Are to baat kare wo baat bhi nahi karte mamla ye hai.
Customer: Ye dekho aap bol rahe hain hai nahi pate hai inka pate hai Haryana inka pin code hai 1250 125050.
Executive: Haryana ka hai.
Customer: Ye registered hai.
Executive: Registered bataiye company ka naam bataiye kis naam se aa raha hai aapke paas.
Customer: Mittal machhardani factory.
Executive: Hai na wo registered nahi hai wo hamare paas free FCP hai matlab free profile inka bana hua hai.
Customer: Free mein bana hai. Haan paid service kabhi inone nahi liya hua hai. Aise bas keval aise normal profile bana ke inka pada hua hai bas.
Customer: Achcha. Aap aapko ye kahan se mile the aapne pehle bhi to inke sath deal kari hui hai na.
Customer: Haan deal to kafi ki hai.
Executive: To pehle pehle jab aapne kari hui hai itni kafi sara to ab ye achanak se jo problem aaya hai na to iska ye ye matlab iska reason kya hai pehle bhi to paisa aap de rahe honge na pehle bhi mal kharid rahe honge.
Customer: Are reason ye hai ki inhone bataya tha inhone bataya nahi ki hum usko mal bhej rahe hain. Jisne paise dale the.
Customer: Humne paise unse dalwaye the inki company mein.
Executive: Kis se dalwaye the?
Customer: Sallu Tomar se.
Customer: Sallu Tomar se. Theek hai achcha kisi aur se aapne unke account mein paisa dalwaya theek hai.
Customer: To unko unhone mal de diya.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: 250 gaddi 251 gaddi.
Executive: Hmm theek hai.
Customer: To uske baad inka kuch payment bada tha.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: To humne mal mangwa kar inko kaha ki chalo theek hai hum aapka hisab kar denge 20000 humne jama rakh diye jab aap payment karenge to mal aap le lenge 20000 hamari jama the pehle.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Bas yahi hua tha.
Executive: Isme kya hua tha unhone kaha ki wo samne wale party. Fraud ka matlab ye hota hai kisi se payment lene ke baad mal na dena. Yahi to hota hai fraud ka matlab. Wo samne wala banda keh raha hai ki unhone matlab case kar diya tha mere upar.
Customer: Case?
Customer: Abhi case hai ki nahi hum pucho to wo bol raha hai ki hum case nahi ki nahi bol rahe hum case ki nahi.
Customer: Tomar keh raha hai humko case hai nahi ki nahi.
Executive: Dekho main aapko ek baat batau Govind ji ye dekho pehli baat to ye personal aapka matter hai hai na. Isme hamara koi bhi wo nahi hai aap pehle se deal kar rahe the unse to hum usme kuch nahi kar sakte. Maine unko call kiya wo mere se seedhe unse baat bhi nahi kar rahe. Wo keh rahe hain ki bhai unko mera address pata hai sab kuch pata hai wo aa jaye mere paas baat karne. Keh rahe hain mal to main unko dunga lekin itni jaldi nahi dunga.
Executive: Ab aap unka jo bhi hai aap personal baat kar lo kyuki isme hum kya hi karenge aap batao.
Customer: Theek theek theek.
Executive: To
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer was allegedly involved in fraud of 7 lakhs.

- Customer wants to know about company registration.

- Customer has payment issues with the other party.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed the company is not registered.

- Executive stated it is a personal matter.

- Executive said IndiaMART cannot intervene.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to resolve issue personally.



Alert (If Any):

fraud

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- fraud, payment, company registration, personal matter
